name: Netflix Themes
description: This browser extension allows users to customize the visual appearance of the Netflix platform by changing the color scheme, font styles, and background images. By providing a variety of pre-made themes and the ability to create custom themes, this extension enhances the viewing experience for users who prefer a more personalized look. The extension is easy to use and allows users to switch between themes quickly, making it a convenient and practical addition to their browsing experience. With this extension, users can transform the look of Netflix to match their style preferences, creating a more enjoyable and visually appealing streaming experience.
